nodes.text: The One Man Submersible Devilfish, also called OMS Devilfish Sub, or the simply the Devilfish sub or Devilfish, was a small submarine vehicle manufactured by Kuat Drive Yards that was used by the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. Devilfish subs were deployed at the Battle of Mon Cala and also supplied to their reinforcements from the Gungan Grand Army. During the rule of the Galactic Empire, seatroopers utilized OMS Devilfish subs after the Battle of Dac City.
